GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
iommu/arm-smmu-v3-sva: Fix mm use-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit fc90f13ea0dcd960e5002d204fa55cec4e0db2fa, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 32784a9562fb0518b12e9797ee2aec52214adf6f. For more details please see the references link.
